summary: REQ-2 is implemented by updating Pride Moments image srcs and alt text in frontend/src/content/prideMoments.ts. REQ-1 is not evidenced because no image files were added under static assets. REQ-3 is not evidenced because no carousel/navigation code changes are shown, only content data changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 5 user-uploaded images (im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, im1-5.jpg) to the frontend static assets so they can be referenced by the Pride Moments carousel.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows no added files ("Added: 0" and "ADDED FILES: none"), so there is no evidence the image assets were actually added to a static assets directory (e.g., frontend/public/assets/) and would be loadable without 404s.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Pride Moments carousel remains fully manual (no auto-advance) and users can navigate through all provided images using previous/next buttons and indicators.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows changes to the Pride Moments content data (image list). There is no evidence of changes to the carousel component/logic to guarantee no auto-advance, wrapping prev/next behavior, indicator dot navigation, or visibility/functionality of controls.
evidence: frontend/src/content/prideMoments.ts (only content updated; no carousel logic shown)
File diff summary indicates only 3 modified files and none appear to be carousel component files

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata for feature requests and known issues in project_state.json
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add static images and update Pride Moments carousel content/behavior; it did not request changes to internal project tracking/state files.
BuildRequest does not request generating or modifying summary documentation of unrelated frontend files.
